channel.title: 2022 on Leipzig Gophers
channel.description: Recent content in 2022 on Leipzig Gophers

item.description: An email exchange from November 2009 (a few weeks after the first presentation on Go): It seems to me that these functions [append, copy] are not useful if we figure out a way to implement generics. Not necessarily a strong argument against them, I suppose, but do we want to introduce new builtin functions if we may not need them? About 4500 days and many proposals later, Go 1.
